column2:
"All right, you've passed that test as well.
Is something the matter? Do you harbor
doubts as to your ability?"

"It's only natural to question your development
right about now, but I assure you, you are
making steady progress."

"You've got to overcome this
special trial and continue onto the next.
There's no way you won't manage it!"

"Well then, I expect to see you at the next boot
camp."

"よし、今回の特訓も合格だ。
……どうした？　己の実力が不安か？"

"伸び悩みを感じる頃合いかと思うが
君の実力は確実に伸びているぞ。
私が保証しよう、間違いない。"

"これだけの特訓を乗り越え
さらに次へと進もうとしているのだ。
その効果が出ないはずがない！"

"それではな！
また、次なる特訓で会おう！"
